016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.junit5;
017
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.SortedSet;
020
021import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
022
023import de.cuioss.test.generator.TypedGenerator;
024import de.cuioss.test.generator.junit.EnableGeneratorController;
025import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.ValueObjectTest;
026import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.property.PropertyConfig;
027import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.property.PropertyConfigs;
028import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.generator.TypedGeneratorRegistry;
029import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.junit5.EnableGeneratorRegistry;
030import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.ConfigurationCallBackHandler;
031import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.property.PropertyMetadata;
032import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.util.GeneratorRegistry;
033import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.util.ReflectionHelper;
034import de.cuioss.tools.reflect.MoreReflection;
035import lombok.Getter;
036
037/**
038 * Extension to {@link JsfEnabledTestEnvironment} that is capable of dealing
039 * with properties and generator like {@link ValueObjectTest}.
040 * <h3>Supported Contracts / Configurations</h3>
041 * <ul>
042 * <li>Faces Mock configuration as defined within
043 * {@link EnableJsfEnvironment}</li>
044 * <li>Handling of Property Generators using annotations, see
045 * {@link de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.generator}</li>
046 * <li>Reflection and annotation based property handling, see
047 * {@link de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.property}</li>
048 * <li>EnableGeneratorController</li>
049 * </ul>
050 * <p>
051 * In case the actual test-class implements {@link TypedGenerator} itself it
052 * will implicitly registered as {@link TypedGenerator} at
053 * {@link TypedGeneratorRegistry}
054 * </p>
055 *
056 * @author Oliver Wolff
057 * @param <T> identifying the concrete type to be tested
058 */
059@EnableGeneratorController
060@EnableGeneratorRegistry
061public abstract class AbstractPropertyAwareFacesTest<T> extends JsfEnabledTestEnvironment
062        implements ConfigurationCallBackHandler<T>, GeneratorRegistry {
063
064    @Getter
065    private Class<T> targetBeanClass;
066
067    @Getter
068    private List<PropertyMetadata> propertyMetadata;
069
070    /**
071     * Initializes all contracts, properties and generator
072     */
073    @BeforeEach
074    public void initializeAbstractPropertyAwareFacesTest() {
075        targetBeanClass = MoreReflection.extractFirstGenericTypeArgument(getClass());
076
077        propertyMetadata = resolvePropertyMetadata();
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Resolves the {@link PropertyMetadata} by using reflections and the
082     * annotations {@link PropertyConfig} and / {@link PropertyConfigs} if provided
083     *
084     * @return a {@link SortedSet} of {@link PropertyMetadata} defining the base
085     *         line for the configured attributes
086     */
087    protected List<PropertyMetadata> resolvePropertyMetadata() {
088        return ReflectionHelper.handlePropertyMetadata(getClass(), getTargetBeanClass());
089    }
090}
